26  template <typename T_y>

29  const char* name,
30  const T_y& y) {
31  for (size_t n = 0; n < stan::length(y); n++) {
32  if (is_nan(value_of_rec(stan::get(y, n))))
33  domain_error_vec(function, name, y, n,
34  "is ", ", but must not be nan!");
35  }
36  }
